IKHASI 2 SIVUBELA INTUTHUKO SIBEKA INTUTHUKO PHAMBILI AGASTI 2021 UNdunankulu nohlelo
lokuxhasa kwezokuvakasha
MAGAYE CELE kanje. Uthe banohlelo olunzulu noluhleleke kahle olumayelana nakho ISIFUNDAZWE saKwaZulu Natal ukuxhaswa kwendima yezokuvakasha. sesibeke eceleni isizumbulu semali eshisi- Uthe ngaphambi kokuba ezokuvakasha we esihlose ngayo ukuba sisetshenziselwe zikhahlanyezwe ukuvumbuka kweCovid ukutakula umkhakha wezokuVakasha 19 okuholele ekuntengantengeni wakulesi siFundazwe. komnotho ezokuVakasha bezigaya inzuzo Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe nguNdunan- elinganiselwa ku-9,6% emnothweni kulu wakulesi siFundazwe, uMnuz Sihle waKwaZulu Natal okuyinto athe beyenza Zikalala. Ubekade ekhuluma kabanzi umehluko omkhulu esiFundazweni. ngokubaluleka kokufukulwa kwezoku- Uthe yingakho ke bangeke baze balenze Vaksha ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuthi iphutha lokuba bawuzibe lo mkhakha awufadabali nje kalula umnotho waKwa- uma sewubhekene nobunzima Zulu Natal. Imali athe seyibekwe eceleni bezezimali. Uthe kulokoza inhlansi uthe ingu-R20 million okuyimali enkulu yethemba ngokuthi izinto sezizoqala kakhulu nathe akangabazi nje nakancane manje zibuyele esimweni uma ukuthi izodala umehluko omkhulu osomabhizinisi bezokuVakasha kakhulu emkhakheni wezokuVakasha. sebelutholile lolu xhaso. “Siyethemba Uchaze eZokuvakasha njengomgogodla ukuthi umehluko omkhulu uzoqala omqoka kakhulu wezomnotho ubonakale manje. Phela lokhu esiFundazweni. Wathi ngenxa yalokho esikwenzayo sikwenza ngoba sifuna kumqoka kakhulu ukuthi ezokuVaka- ukubona umehluko kwezokuVakasha. sha zikuthole ukubhekelelwa uma IKwaZulu Natal iyakholelwa kakhulu kunesidingo sokuba kwenziwe kanjalo. ekutheni ezokuVakasha ziklama indima UZikalala ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi enkulu kakhulu ekufukulweni eZokuVakasha zikhahlanyezwe kakhulu komnotho,’’usho kanje. Esephetha ukuvumbuka kokhuvethe iCovid 19. ugqugquzele bonke Udalule ukuthi ibhizinisi lezokuVakasha UNDUNANKULU wesiFundawe saKwaZulu Natal, uMnuz Sihle osomabhizinisi abakhona kwezoku ngalinye lizogixabezwa ngemali engu-R50 Zikalala odalule uhlelo abanalo lokuxhasa osomabhizinisi abancane. Vakasha ukuthi bangadikibali kodwa 000. “Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi amabhizinisi bazibambe ziqine kunakuqala. ezokuVaksha ayaluthola lolu xhaso Inhloso enkulu yalolu xhaso ukuqiniseki- zalapha KwaZulu Natal okuyinto esik- esilumemezelayo lapha namhlanje. sa ukuthi ziyathuthuka ezokuVakasha holwa ukuthi ibalulekile kakhulu,’’usho

“Bese kuqala kubanzima kakhulu ukusebenza. Nokho ke manje sikholwa ukuthi konke

ni umphakathi ngezindlela ezahlukene. kwabantu besifazane uthe lolu xhaso
Loyo ongungqongqoshe wezoku uthu- luzokwenza umehluko omkhulu kubona. kiswa komphakathi KwaZulu Natal, Uthe isimo besinzima kakhulu uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza uthe kumqoka ngaphambi kokuba bathole lolu xhaso. kakhulu ukwesekwa kwezinhlangano Uthe kulokoza inhlansi yethemba manje ezigxile kakhulu ekutakuleni umalunga mayelana nokuhamba kahle kwezinto omphakathi. Uthe okuyikhona okudale kuyona yonke imisebenzi abazoyenza ukuthi banikezele ngosizo lwale mali kusuka manje kuya phambili. kube yizibhelu zakamuva athe zibo- UGugu uthe inqola bese iqala manje nakale zishiye umonakalo omkhulu ibhajwa odakeni ngenxa yokungabi nazo kakhulu KwaZulu Natal yonkana. Ube izinsiza ezanele zokuqhuba umsebenzi eseyala oSihlalo balezi zinhlangano kanye nokushoda kwayo imali. ukuthi bangalenzi iphutha bayisebenzise Uthe: “Bese kuqala kubanzima kakhulu budlabha le mali. Echaza uthe: “Lolu ux- ukusebenza. Nokho ke manje sikholwa haso lumqoka kakhulu ikakhulukazi ku- ukuthi konke sekuzoba lula kakhulu zona lezi zinhlangao.Ngikholwa ukuthi njengoba sesithole lolu xhaso manje sezizokwazi ukuthi ziqhubeke olumqoka eMnyangweni
nokwenza umsebenzi wazo ngokukhulu- wezoku uthukiswa koMphakathi leka. Kungumsebenzi wethu ukulekelela KwaZulu Natal.’’ izinhlangano ezinjengalezi,’’usho kanje. UNkk Zipho Msimanga wenhlangano
UNGQONGQOSHE wezoku uthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu OSihlalo balezi zinhlangno babonge iZala Woman Initiative elekelela kakhulu Natal, uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza uMnyango wakhe unikezele banconcoza kakhulu ngalolu xhaso abantu besifazane nayo igixabezwe ngosizo olumqoka kakhulu ezinhlanganweni zomphakathi. abaluchaze njengolumqoka kakhulu ngoxhaso. UZipho uthe bayabonga kakhulu ngokuthola usizo ezingeni noluzokwenza umehluko omkhulu kuk- hona konke abakwenzela umphakathi lesiFundazwe. MAGAYE CELE ola uxhaso lwemali oluvela kuMnyango abakuwona. wezoku uthukiswa komphakathi Kwa- weSila Foundation okuyinhlangano esiza uxhaso inhlangano ngayinye ZINYELWE yinyoni esandleni izinhlan- Zulu Natal. Izisebenzi zihloniphe
abesifazane zidlubhe amalokwe
oselwahlonzwa njengolusemthethweni Okhulumela uMasipala waseMsun-
ngokwekhalenda laseNingizimu Afrika. duzi uNkk obeka Mafumbatha uthe Wonke amehlo abephenduka nalezi bengumasipala bakujabulele ukubona sebenzi ngoMsombuluko ebezibonakala izisebenzi zabo zesilisa ikakhulukazi zilenge emalolini zishaya amakhwelo lezi eziqoqa udoti zivolontiya ngokwazo kubonakala ukuthi injabulo iyachichima zihlonipha ozakwabo eziyibambe nabo kuzona. ISIVUBELA INTUTHUKO kwa-Waste Department ngokuthi nazo ebikhona edolobheni laseMgungund- zingene ezicathulweni zazo zidlubhe lovu izibonele lezi zisebenzi ebezisel- amalokwe njengabo besifazane. Uthe olini ebelehla ngoLangalibalele Street umsebenzi wokuqoqa nokuthutha (Longmarket) ebezimata zenza umse- imfucuza ubucayi ngakho kunikezana benzi wazo wansuku zonke wokuqoqa ithemba ukubona izisebenzi zisekana udoti. Obekuqapheleka kulezi sebenzi emsebenzini wazo. Uthe lokhu obekwen- nobekuthatha amehlo abantu yijubane ziwa yizisebenzi kukhombisa ukuthi ebeliqhuma kuzona uma zehla elolini bayaziqonda izinselelo ezibhekana lokho obekwenza ukuthi umuntu agxile nozakwabo emsebenzini wabo. “Siyazi kuzona ngoba kakujwayelekile ukubona ukuthi kulezi zinto ezilahlwayo kukhona umuntu wesifazane egijima ngejubane neziyingozi kakhulu kodwa ukubona eliphezulu. Nokho uma sezisondela edu- izisebenzi zesilisa zijabule ngaleya ndlela zane bekubonakala ukuthi ngezesilisa lokho kuyakhuthaza. Nezabesifazane NGEZINYE zezisebenzi zesilisa zaseMsunduzi kodwa zigqoke amalokwe. Abantu abe- ziyakhuthazeka uma zibona zesekwa eziqoqa udoti ebezidlubhe amalokwe. besedolobheni bebengazibekile phansi ngozakwabo. IKHASI 4 SIVUBELA INTUTHUKO SIBEKA INTUTHUKO PHAMBILI AGASTI 2021
UNkonyeni ugezeke igilo ngamaphoyisa
esifazane KwaZulu-Natal
TSEPO MOTLOKOA uPhepha nokuXhumanisa uMphakathi theni inhlalakahle kubantu abasakhele. ebesiseMariannhill Toll Plaza ebesihlan- KwaZulu-Natal uchome uphaphe UNkk Nkonyeni uhlanganyele na- ganyelwe yilamaphoyisa abeqhamuka
UNKK Neliswa Peggy Nkonyeni opha- legwalagwala amaphoyisa esifazane kule- makhulukhulu alaba besifazane aban- ephikweni lwe-Road Tra c Inspectorate
thiswe uMnyango wezoku utha, ezok- si sifundazwe ngeqhaza alibambile ekule- gamaphoyisa kwisivimbamgwaqo (RTI), iDurban Metro Police nol-
we-South African Police Service (Saps) ezokhombisa ubukhona bawo njengoba iNingizimu Afrika beyibungaza usuku lwembokodo (Women’s Day) oluba BLUEPRINT 4447/Z njalo mhlaka 9 ku-August ngokwekhal- enda laleli lizwe. Ekhuluma lapha uNkk Nkonyeni utuse ubuhlakani bokuqaphela kwama- phoyisa esifazane uma eqhathaniswa nawesilisa ikakhulukazi uma kwen- ziwa umsebenzi. Kulesi sivimbamzila kupeqululwe izimoto eziwu-500 ezinye zazo ezitholakale zikwabanye abantu ngokungemthetho okuvele ukuthi zantshontshwa ngo-2015 ezingxenyezni zesifundazwe saKwaZulu-Natal ika- khulukazi emalokishini akhele i eku
noMgungundlovu. Lapha bekuqiniseki- swa ukuthi zonke izimoto zikulungele ukuba semgaqweni nokuthi kubhekwe ukuthi abashayeli bayahambisana yini nemibandela yokunqanda ukubheb- hetheka ngamandla kwe-Covid 19 edla silaza nafumuka kuleminyaka emibili. UNkk Nkonyeni enika umdlandla abe- sifazane abasendimeni yezokuphepha uthe bangagudluki emsebenzini wabo omqoka abawenzela isizwe. “Sesis- ungule uhlaka lapho esizobe sibheka khona iqhaza lamaphoyisa esifazane nokuwaveza ukuthi abonwe yizwe ukuthi nawo aqotho emsebenzini wawo futhi awenza ngokuthenbeka njengo- ba enesiphiwo sokuqaphela. Lokho singekungabaze ukuthi amaphoyisa esi- fazane aqaphela kakhulu futhi ayaqike- lela ngaso sonke isikhathi uma enza umsebenzi wawo,” kusho yena. Ephetha uNkk Nkonyeni uthe kunezigcawu azihlalayo nabakhulu bomnyango awuphathisiweyo lapho bezama ISIQALO ESISHA, AMATHEMBA ukuthola izixazululo ezinkingeni
ezikhungatha i-Road Tra c Inspec- torate esifundazweni saKwaZulu-Natal. AMASHA. Uthe bafuna ukuphuthumisa ukuvalwa kwezikhala zemisebenzi yezikhulu emnyangweni wakhe futhi ukhuthaza abesifazane ukungena kuzona. Uthe baphezu kwazo izikhalo Njengoba izwe lethu liqala ukwelulama ngemuva kokuhlukunyezwa ubhubhane, zomphakathi ezingena ehhovisini lakhe kwa-SANRAL, sikholwa ukuthi sekuyisikhathi sokubuyela ekuthuthukiseni ezingakaze kuhlangatshenzwane nazo. ingqalasizinda. Sesisungule indathane yemikhankaso esilungele ukuqalwa, yokwakha, ukulungisa, ukulawula nokuqhuba kahle, engasiza ukuvuselela umnotho waseNingizimu Afrika. Lemikhankaso izoba negalelo entuthukweni yezomnotho, ekusunguleni amathuba emisebenzi nasekuguqukeni kwezomnotho, ukunciphisa ukungalingani nobubha.
Njengabalawuli benxanxathela yethu yemigwaqo kazwelonke, sizoqhubeka nokufaka isandla entuthukweni yomnotho waseNingizimu Afrika ngokuhlinzeka ngemigwaqo engcono.
SANRAL. Ngaphezulu kwemigwaqo.

ngokuthi abantu abasha bakule ndawo kwabantu besilisa kungaholela ekutheni bahlangane babe yimbumba. Bethula nabantu besifazane nabo kube lula ka- iKwaNgcolosi Progressive Mens Hub khulu ukuthi babukele kokuhle okwenzi- okuyinhlangano athe izosetshenziselwa wa ngabantu besilisa. ukubhunga kabanzi ngezinselelo Echaza uthe: ‘’Manje sesibona inqwaba eziningi kakhulu ezikhinyabeza abantu yamantombazane amancane aphuza besilisa. Okunye akubalulile ukwanda ngumuntu wesifazane,’’ kuchaza uPhaka- kwabesifazane abakhulelwayo mani. Uthe kumqoka kakhulu ukuthi besebancane.
